repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University English Department Records
did.abstract: Committee meeting notes and faculty reports from the WSU English Department from 1947-2001.

bioghist.p: The department of English Language and Literature first appears in WSU catalogs in 1893. It was later renamed as the English department in 1911.

scopecontent.p: Faculty and committee meeting notes from 1947-2001, reconfiguration reports related to the reduction of the English department starting in 1990.

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.

Box 1 contains a collection of faculty meeting notes and reports on the reconfiguration and reduction of the English Department, organized by date from 1947-1994. Box 2 contains committee meeting notes, administrative material on special collections, and ephemeral material.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University English Department Records, 1947-2001 (UA2014-13)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to WSU Libraries' MASC by Lee Knows of the Department of English on July 15, 2014 and retained as UA2014-13.

processinfo.p: (MASC STAFF USE) Interfiled departmental newsletters into various WSU pubs. Needs refoldering, deduplicating, some reorganizing. Some refoldering for rehousing occurred - that material still needs checked. Brief electronic documents content list received with it. May want to co-process with UA99-37, UA07-12, UA13-10.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.corpname: Washington State University. English Department -- Records and correspondence
